pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiple-Direction Logrank Test // Implemented is the multiple- direction logrank test for two-sample right censored data. In addition to the statistic two p-values are calculated: the first one is based on a chi-squared approximation and the second one is based on a permutation approach. Ditzhaus, M. and Friedrich, S. (2018) arXiv:1807.05504.
